abstract: So far, Rajat K. Gupta has not been criminally charged, but prosecutors say they have audiotapes of him passing on illegal tips to Raj Rajaratnam, who is heading to trial.
snippet: So far, Rajat K. Gupta has not been criminally charged, but prosecutors say they have audiotapes of him passing on illegal tips to Raj Rajaratnam, who is heading to trial.

headline.main: Prosecutors Link Former Goldman Director to Galleon
